name: Push-Ups
description: A great bodyweight exercise for chest, triceps, and shoulders.

name: Squats
description: Works your legs and glutes. Keep your back straight!

name: Jumping Jacks
description: A classic cardio warm-up exercise to get your heart rate up.

name: Plank
description: Strengthens the entire core. Keep a straight line from head to toes.

name: Lunges
description: Great for glutes and quads. Step forward and lower your back knee.

name: Burpees
description: Full-body movement that burns calories fast!

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Core and cardio in one! Drive your knees toward your chest quickly.

name: Dumbbell Rows
description: Targets your back muscles. Keep your core tight.

name: Bicep Curls
description: Focus on controlled curls. Don't swing your arms.

name: Tricep Dips
description: Build strong triceps using a sturdy chair or bench.

name: Crunches
description: Focus on your upper abs. Donâ€™t pull your neck!

name: High Knees
description: Drive knees up fast for a powerful cardio blast.

name: Jump Rope
description: Excellent cardio that improves coordination and burns fat.

name: Deadlifts
description: Total-body strength move. Keep your back straight!

name: Russian Twists
description: Twist from the core! Great for obliques.
